plugin.name: app
plugin.description: Elements used to communicate with applications

element.name: appsink
element.description: Allow the application to get access to raw buffer
element.author: David Schleef <ds@schleef.org>, Wim Taymans <wim.taymans@gmail.com>

element.name: appsrc
element.description: Allow the application to feed buffers to a pipeline
element.author: David Schleef <ds@schleef.org>, Wim Taymans <wim.taymans@gmail.com>
